title: These Puffer Jackets Will Keep You Warm Throughout the Cold-Weather Months

html:
Best Velvet Puffer

Coach Velvet Puffer

If you’ve been looking for an elevated puffer, look no further. Velvet instantly makes this jacket chic without compromising on warmth or comfort.

Size Range: XS-XL

Material: 45% polyester, 55% cotton

Insulation: Goose down, goose feathers, polyester

Best Alternative Style Puffer

Tach Clothing Tach Esme Puffer Jacket

An alternative style to a traditional puffer jacket, this feels sophisticated and unique. If you don’t want to sacrifice style for warmth, this will be right up your alley.

Size Range: XS-XL

Material: 100% polyamide

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Fluffy Puffer

UGG Emmalyn UGGfluff Puffer Jacket

The coziness of an UGG boot has made its way into a puffer jacket—a comfort lover’s dream come true.

Size Range: XS-3X

Material: 100% polyester

Insulation: Down fill

Customer review:“It’s true to size; however, I ordered a size up to wear over sweaters/hoodies, and I still have extra room. It’s a great piece, get it!!”

Best Eco-Friendly Puffer

Everlane The Puffer Bomber

A rich green is the perfect color for the cold months ahead. Made with recycled materials, pair it with your favorite jeans for a timeless look.

Size Range: 2XS-2XL

Material: 100% recycled nylon

Insulation: 100% recycled polyester

Customer review: “Really nice puffer jacket. Material is nice and not noisy while wearing. Sleeve length is great. True to size”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Ultra-Warm Puffer

Moose Knuckles Moonstone Down Puffer Jacket

If we were going to be outside all day, we would want to be wearing this puffer. Its high fill density means it will keep you nice and toasty, while the attached hood adds an extra layer of protection.

Size Range: XS-XL

Material: 100% nylon

Insulation: 90% down, 10% feather

Density: 800 fill

Best Cloud-Like Puffer

Free People Solid Cotton Candy Puffer

A puffer that looks and feels like a cloud is always a winner in our book. And we mean that in the best way possible. If you’re looking for ultimate comfort in a puffer jacket, this one's for you.

Size Range: XS-XL

Material: 100% nylon

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Neutral Puffer

Jenni Kayne Puffer Jacket

This puffer is water-resistant, which makes it perfect for those days when there’s a possibility of precipitation. Not to mention, the muted colorways make this jacket versatile enough to go with everything.

Size Range: XXS-XXL

Material: 100% polyester

Insulation: 80% down, 20% feather down

Customer review: “The jacket color is really nice and it is so soft. Not too puffy so it falls nicely and I really like that the hood is removable.”

Best Short Puffer Jacket

SIMKHAI Lana Puffer Jacket

We love a cropped puffer jacket around here, and this one is no exception. Its versatility is unmatched, meaning it’s great for daily wear; denim, skirts, and all. Plus, the ribbed collar provides extra comfort.

Size Range: XS-XL

Material: 100% polyester

Insulation: 80% down, 20% feather down

Customer review: “The jacket color is really nice and it is so soft. Not too puffy so it falls nicely and I really like that the hood is removable.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Puffer for Skiing

Goldbergh Porter Puffer Jacket

A puffer jacket that doubles as a ski jacket is ideal for someone who only wants one puffy staple for the season but needs it to serve multiple purposes.

Size Range: 2-8

Material: 42% recycled polyester, 58% polyester

Insulation: 10% feathers, 90% goose down

Best Go-To Puffer

Aritzia The Super Puff

Honestly speaking, it’s hard to get far without seeing someone wearing Aritzia’s Super Puff—or any of its many iterations. It’s practically synonymous with the term “puffer jacket.” So yeah, this is a must-have in anyone’s closet.

Size Range: 3XS - 2XL

Material: 100% nylon; cuffs: 80% nylon, 20% elastane

Insulation: 100% responsibly sourced goose down

Density: 700 fill

Customer Review: “I absolutely love this puffer jacket. I purchased the regular and it’s the perfect length. Great quality and is just overall very flattering and comfortable. It is worth every penny!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Tried-and-True Puffer

The North Face 1996 Retro Nuptse Jacket

Another puffer jacket of the generation (and generations past) is The North Face’s Nuptse. And incase you’re not a believer, the brand practices rigorous testing protocols that not only utilizes laboratory test results, but also in-the-field user testing. So, they know what they’re doing! Senior fashion commerce editor Dale Arden Chong wears this coat all winter to run any and every errand and it’s wonderful, doing exactly what she needed it to be. She suggests wearing this with your favorite jeans and sneakers for a quick adventure outside.

Size Range: XS-3X

Material: 100% recycled nylon ripstop

Insulation: Goose down

Density: 700 fill

Customer Review: “I am a contractor for USPS and I spend a lot of time outside in the cold. This is the warmest puffer jacket I have ever had.”

Best Black Puffer

Rains W Alta Puffer Jacket

Can you even say you live in New York if you don’t own a big black puffer? This hooded puffer is stylish, waterproof, includes a chin guard, and, most importantly, warm. What more could you need?

Size Range: XS-XL

Material: 100% polyester with polyurethane coating

Insulation: Performance recycled fiber insulation

Customer Review: “Rains is my go-to brand for performance puffers. Their pieces are so warm and rarely ever let me down!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Fail-Safe Puffer

Canada Goose Junction Parka Pastels

Sometimes, braving the cold feels more like braving the arctic tundra. In which case, be sure to reach for this foolproof Canada Goose parka.

Size Range: 2XS-2XL

Material: EnduraLuxe

Insulation: Duck down

Density: 750 fill

Customer Review: “I’ve been promoting this jacket on my social media and received a lot of positive feedback. The color, fabric, and weight can be best described as equivalent to a cloud.”

Best Long Puffer

Moncler Suyen Down Quilted Nylon Hooded Parka

In the moments when something on the shorter side simply won’t cut it, a longer puffer will be what you need. Pair this one with your favorite fall boots for a classic cold-weather ensemble.

Size Range: 0-6

Material: Nylon

Insulation: 90/10 down

Density: Feather fill

Customer Review: “As usual, Moncler hits it out of the park. A little bit roomier than other Moncler coats I own, which is nice for layering in winter.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Celeb-Approved Puffer

Mackage Kay Down Coat

Meghan Markle has been spotted wearing coats from Mackage. In other words, this brand is legit.

Size Range: XXS-2XL

Material: 100% polyester

Insulation: Recycled down

Density: 800 fill

Customer Review: “Gorgeous coat that looks beautiful, without being in your face as it relates to the brand. Highly recommend for someone wanting a sharp looking, quality, warm coat.”

Best Affordable Puffer

MEROKEETY Winter Long Sleeve Zip Puffer Jacket

Fashionable, affordable, and wildly popular (this jacket has 4.5 stars based on over 2,000 reviews), you’ll want to get this for yourself and see what everyone else is obsessing about.

Size Range: XS-XL

Material: 100% polyester

Insulation: 100% polyester

Customer Review: “It looks so good. So chic, and frankly it looks expensive. When I tell people I got it on amazon and I’ve had it for almost 2 years they’re always shocked. I don’t know how they made this puffer so good but they just did. Buy it. Trust me.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Sporty Puffer

Lululemon Wunder Puff Cropped Jacket

Whether you’re heading to yoga class or coffee with friends, this water-repellent Lululemon puffer will keep your arms warm through it all. Oh, and that medium forest shade is nothing to shy away from, either.

Size Range: 0-14

Material: 100% recycled polyester

Insulation: 80% grey goose down, 20% grey Goose feathers

Density: 600 fill

Customer Review: “I bought the cropped and the long wunder puff and I aboslutely love both of them. I wear the cropped green more casually and the long version for the coldest days. Both versions hold up in snow and rain and keep me really warm. Love love love this coat!”

Best Packable Puffer

Uniqlo Ultra Light Down Jacket

As fun and warm as puffer jackets can be, they don’t always make for the most travel-friendly pieces. Luckily, you can always opt for a packable option like this Uniqlo one. Say goodbye to a jacket taking over your whole suitcase. And who can be mad at that price?

Size Range: XXS-XXL

Materials: 100% Nylon

Customer Review: “So light and perfect. The packable pouch is KEY when traveling; it saves so much room in my luggage.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Cashmere Puffer

Naked Cashmere Rachel Puffer Jacket

We don’t need a cashmere puffer jacket. But also, we need a cashmere puffer jacket.

Size Range: XS-XL

Material: Shell: 100% cashmere; lining: 100% silk

Insulation: 100% recycled poly filling

Customer Reviews: “No one needs a cashmere puffer…until they try this on! The color is even better in person. You can’t get cold, and it just makes you feel beautiful! Worth every single penny. Wish I could afford one in every color!”

Best Velour Puffer

Alo Yoga Ribbed Velour Gold Rush Puffer

Maybe we’re just millennials living out our early aughts phase once again, but tell us this is velour, and it’s in our carts.

Size Range: XS-L

Material: Ribbed velour puffer

Customer Review: “Beautiful jacket—the fabric is of high quality and looks classy & unique. I love the inside pockets, and it will definitely keep you warm. It is a little heavy when on however worth it because not only is it warm but looks expensive.”

Amanda Le is a contributing writer at Hearst Magazines, where she covers fashion, beauty, lifestyle, and entertainment. In her free time, you can find her thrifting her next outfit, traveling to new cities, crushing a boxing class, or eating her way through NYC!
